projects.name: ARchemisT
projects.details: I launched a responsive website along with Figma to solicit a donation for holding an art and chemistry event, and performed search engine optimization, resulting in achieving the monetary goal in five days.

projects.name: assiston
projects.details: I collaborated with a web designer and tracked our progress to build custom WordPress themes for study abroad agencies so that they can introduce their business to visitors and post their news.

projects.name: Chat App
projects.details: I developed the chat app which provides real time communication with Node.js, Socket.IO, and React.
